turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, I am wanting to buy a pizza from pizza hut

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thanks for calling pizza hut, is this for the lakewood location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes it is!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Perfect can I start off with a name?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes my name is jack

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thanks jack, can I get a phone number?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Perfect, what can I get you Jack?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like one cheese pizza please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: what are my options?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: small, medium and large

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will take a large

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want any thing else sir? any sides?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No I do not

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, your total today will be $15

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you I will be paying by cash

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Perfect, your order will be ready to pickup in 25 minutes

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: thank you have a good day

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thanks you too
